common.needEnterAtLeastCharacters: Need to enter at least {n} characters

about.coolHelpProject: If someone wants to help the project
about.feedbackQuestions: What can be improved? What is superfluous? What should I redo? What doesn't work?
about.paragraph1: Initially, there was a desire to make a functional where the available number of moves is entered and there is a button "Find the best rewards". When you click on the button, the path is calculated. A map is a set of nodes, similar to graphs. But when calculating, you need to take into account the human factor: it is more profitable for someone to take emeralds, and for someone to take stones of appearance. Therefore, I refused this functionality. Let the person build the path himself and receive the necessary rewards.
about.reason1: On the first map of the island, when a large number of moves were scored, it was difficult to calculate the moves and rewards. The best rewards are in the towers. The towers are located far from the center. Will there be enough moves before them?... It is difficult to calculate, very difficult. It is easier to mark the path as on a piece of paper.
about.reason2: With an open card available, it was also difficult to look for rewards. For example, emeralds are needed, there are hundreds of dots on the map with different pictures, among which it is not easy to see the right one. So you also need to remember... It's easier to filter the icons.

contact.fillFieldsForContact: If you have any interesting ideas or questions, please fill in the following fields on the contact form. Thanks!
contact.ctrlF5: If something doesn't work, then maybe a magic page refresh will help, Ctrl+F5.

help.paragraph1: Anyone who wants to help, I will be glad.
help.help1: Frontend developers, the site code is open! {link}
help.help2: Make normal resource icons, without artifacts.
help.todo1: Add news, coordinate with the backend.
help.todo2: Make a button "show the whole island".

home.firstParagraph: There is a new Adventure Island event in the game. Where you need to spend the researcher's moves and open the map nodes, receive gifts. Initially, the entire map is closed and it is unknown which way to move to get the best prize. Let's discover the island together!
home.loadingFailDeveloperShow: Failed to upload. The developers see the problem and will fix it soon.
